descripcion: Powerful, friendly and fun this is the HP All In One computer, suitable for all your | needs, from sending an e-mail to playing online games, viewing high definition images with its Full HD screen and its WLED backlight. It has a 4 GB RAM memory that allows you to do several tasks simultaneously without any inconvenience, it also has 1 TB so you can store multimedia files, documents, programs and more without worry. Buy it already.
